question: Which one of the following is not an IGO (Intergovernmental Organization) ?
explanation: Amnesty International is not an Intergovernmental organization. It is an international non-governmental organization, formed in 1961, which campaigns against violations of human rights. Widely respected and awarded the Nobel peace prize in 1977, its monitoring of human rights issues through Amnesty International Reports has provided information widely used by policy makers and political scientists.
